title: Optimism-Based Velodrome Token Slides Nearly 8% Ahead of Major Upgrade
description: Velodrome’s upgrade is slated for June 15 and is a complete overhaul of the protocol.

title: Privacy Concerns Dominate CBDC Discussion at Consensus 2023
description: Some Consensus 2023 participants argue that the economic benefits of CBDCs  are not worth the threats to privacy in an excerpt from CoinDesk’s first-ever Consensus @ Consensus Report.

title: Introducing CoinDesk’s First-Ever ‘Consensus @ Consensus’ Report
description: Based on intimate, curated group discussions that took place at Consensus 2023, it covers a wide range of pressing issues for the digital assets industry.

title: El Salvador's Volcano Energy Secures $1B in Commitments for 241 MW Bitcoin Mine
description: The 241 MW site will be powered by wind and solar energy.

title: Binance Executive Controlled Bank Accounts Belonging to U.S. Wing in 2019-20: Reuters
description: Binance.US has always claimed to be independent from Binance, a stance that may come under scrutiny following this news.

title: Speculation mounts on Central Asian country to announce Bitcoin treasury holding
description:
Speculation is mounting over which Central Asian country has added Bitcoin to its treasury. On June 4, Crypto Lawyer Irina Heaver said a country in Central Asia would soon announce holding BTC as a treasury asset. When pressed on who, Heaver said client confidentiality prohibits her from naming the country. But the announcement will be […]

The post Speculation mounts on Central Asian country to announce Bitcoin treasury holding appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Decentralized-to-centralized exchange trade volume ratio sets new all-time high at 22%
description:
Data shows that the decentralized exchange (DEX) to centralized exchange (CEX) trading volume ratio is up. Commenting on the trend, the founder of Your Crypto Community Duo Nine, stated, “DEXs are eating CEXs market share.” He attributed this to “more regulation,” which meant “DEXs are exploding.” Signing off, he wrote, “The future is decentralized.” The […]

The post Decentralized-to-centralized exchange trade volume ratio sets new all-time high at 22% appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Analyst Says ‘Gem Finder’ Coinbase Ventures Added These 4 Projects to Their Portfolio in May
description: In a video update published on 4 June 2023, popular crypto market commentary show “Altcoin Daily,” the hosts provided an insightful analysis of four crypto projects Coinbase Ventures invested in last month. Coinbase Ventures, the investment arm of Coinbase, has a proven track record of identifying promising crypto projects, with previous successful investments including Compound, […]

title: Bitcoin Interest Hits Rock Bottom: Google Trends Data Shows Lowest Score in 7 Months
description: According to Google Trends, worldwide interest surrounding the term “bitcoin” has plummeted to its lowest point since October 2022, registering a mere 17 out of 100. The active interest for the term has taken a nosedive since June 2022, when the search query for bitcoin reached a score of 64 out of 100. Global Interest […]

title: Institutional Adoption of Crypto as Franklin Templeton Sees New Asset Era
description:
Sandy Kaul says investment portfolios seek frontier markets with big returns beyond hyper-fixation on Bitcoin. Franklin Templeton sees the crypto ecosystem as a collection of digital nation-states. Interest in crypto is shifting from retail to institutions, with leading organizations positioning themselves for a new asset era. YouTuber Scott Melker recently posted a new YouTube video […]

The post Institutional Adoption of Crypto as Franklin Templeton Sees New Asset Era appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Willy Woo Says Bitcoin (BTC) Could Be Ready To Rip in June if Signal Plays Out – Here’s His Outlook
description:
A widely followed on-chain analyst says that one signal is pointing toward a possible burst to the upside for Bitcoin (BTC) this month. Popular on-chain analyst Willy Woo tells his one million Twitter followers that the cost-basis analysis of Bitcoin is hinting at an upcoming rally for the top crypto asset by market cap in […]
